org.sm.fraxion.fractals.util

Class IterationResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sm.fraxion.fractals.util.IterationResult

  • public final class IterationResult
extends java.lang.Object
    The IterationResult class provides a container for the results of the iteration of a single point's orbit.

    Note that this class cannot be subclassed!

    Version:
    23/06/2015
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet

    • Method Detail

      • getSector

        public int getSector(int nrOfSectors)
        Returns the sector of the final value.

        Note that sectors start counting at 1.

        Parameters:
        nrOfSectors - the number of sectors that are possible
        Returns:
        the sector of the final value

      • liesInInterior

        public boolean liesInInterior()
        Returns whether or not the final point of this iteration sequence lies in the fractal's interior.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether or not the final point of this iteration sequence lies in the fractal's interior

      • streamLoad

        public void streamLoad(java.io.DataInputStream dataInputStream)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the iteration data from a file as a stream.
        Parameters:
        dataInputStream - a data inputstream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case a parse error occurs

      • streamSave

        public void streamSave(java.io.DataOutputStream dataOutputStream)

        Saves the iteration data to a file as a stream.
        Parameters:
        dataOutputStream - a data outputstream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case a write error occurs
